casebody.data:
Ethel G. Pattison, appellant, v. Douglas Pattison, appellee.Gen. No. 6,808.Petition for rule to show cause why husband should not be held in contempt for failure to pay alimony. Decree reducing alimony. Appeal from the Circuit Court of Carroll county; the Hon. Robert K. Welsh, Judge, presiding. Heard in this court at the April term, 1920.Affirmed.Opinion filed October 12, 1920.Rehearing denied December 2, 1920.

Heard, J., took no part.

Elwyn R. Shaw, for appellant. A. E. Fisher, for appellee. Mr. Justice Niehaus

delivered the opinion of the court.
